checkConstraint.constraint: (((type)::text <> 'call'::text) OR ((gas IS NOT NULL) AND (((error IS NULL) AND (gas_used IS NOT NULL) AND (output IS NOT NULL)) OR ((error IS NOT NULL) AND (output IS NULL)))))
checkConstraint.name: call_has_error_or_result

checkConstraint.constraint: (((type)::text <> 'create'::text) OR ((gas IS NOT NULL) AND (((error IS NULL) AND (created_contract_address_hash IS NOT NULL) AND (created_contract_code IS NOT NULL) AND (gas_used IS NOT NULL)) OR ((error IS NOT NULL) AND (created_contract_address_hash IS NULL) AND (created_contract_code IS NULL) AND (gas_used IS NULL)))))
checkConstraint.name: create_has_error_or_result

checkConstraint.constraint: (((type)::text <> 'selfdestruct'::text) OR ((from_address_hash IS NOT NULL) AND (gas IS NULL) AND (to_address_hash IS NOT NULL)))
checkConstraint.name: selfdestruct_has_from_and_to_address

checkConstraint.constraint: ((block_hash IS NULL) OR (block_number IS NOT NULL))
checkConstraint.name: collated_block_number

checkConstraint.constraint: ((block_hash IS NULL) OR (cumulative_gas_used IS NOT NULL))
checkConstraint.name: collated_cumalative_gas_used

checkConstraint.constraint: ((block_hash IS NULL) OR (gas_price IS NOT NULL))
checkConstraint.name: collated_gas_price

checkConstraint.constraint: ((block_hash IS NULL) OR (gas_used IS NOT NULL))
checkConstraint.name: collated_gas_used

checkConstraint.constraint: ((block_hash IS NULL) OR (index IS NOT NULL))
checkConstraint.name: collated_index

checkConstraint.constraint: ((block_hash IS NOT NULL) OR (block_number IS NULL))
checkConstraint.name: pending_block_number

checkConstraint.constraint: ((block_hash IS NOT NULL) OR (cumulative_gas_used IS NULL))
checkConstraint.name: pending_cumalative_gas_used

checkConstraint.constraint: ((block_hash IS NOT NULL) OR (gas_used IS NULL))
checkConstraint.name: pending_gas_used

checkConstraint.constraint: ((block_hash IS NOT NULL) OR (index IS NULL))
checkConstraint.name: pending_index

checkConstraint.constraint: (((block_hash IS NULL) AND (status IS NULL)) OR (block_hash IS NOT NULL) OR ((status = 0) AND ((error)::text = 'dropped/replaced'::text)))
checkConstraint.name: status
